fields.description:
h5. Description:
When building apps to iOS simulators, the following error occurs:
{code:java}
[TRACE] :  [AlloyTester] assertion failed: 15A284 13B137: libxpc.dylib + 58126 [0F47719F-3076-3664-A64B-CEB6901B254D]: 0x7d
{code}

The error does not seem to have an impact to the performance of the app. The app will build successfully and will function correctly.This does not occur when building the same apps to iOS devices. 

*Note:* There have been reports of the same issue occurring for people developing on iOS outside of Appcelerator products, and is most likely not an issue on our side.

h5. Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a classic or alloy project.
2. Build to iOS Simulator.
3. Read console for error once simulator is launched.
h5. Result:
"Assertion failed" error will occur upon sim launch.

h5. Expected Result:
error should not occur upon sim launch.
fields.summary: iOS: assertion failed: libxpc.dylib when building apps to Simulators
fields.environment:
Devices: iPhones 6S+ (9.1) 
Simulators: (9.1) & (8.4) 
Mac OSX El Capitan 10.11 (15A284)
Ti SDK: 5.1.0.v20151118214427
Appc Studio: 4.4.0.201511182122
Appc NPM: 4.2.2-1
Appc CLI: 5.1.0-60
Alloy: 1.7.26
Xcode 7.1(7B91b)
Node v0.12.7
